messages.title: Lib Dems lead the fight to stop Brexit
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats want to stop Brexit. We've been fighting it since the day after the referendum. We are the strongest party of Remain, with a clear and simple message: let’s stop Brexit. Jo Swinson said, 'Stopping Brexit means that we can focus on tackling the big issues facing the UK right now. We can build a brighter future where we can all grow our economy, tackle the climate emergency, and address the crises in our NHS and schools.'

messages.title: Vote to End this Mess
messages.content: ONLY THE LIB DEMS CAN BEAT LABOUR HERE

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats propose to stop Brexit and focus on other critical issues such as the economy, climate emergency, and public services like NHS and schools.

mentions.tacticalSituation: ONLY THE LIB DEMS CAN BEAT LABOUR HERE

quotes.text: Jeremy Corbyn refused NINE TIMES to say whether he thought Britain should leave the EU or remain.
Labour is proposing to negotiate a new deal with the European Union.
Labour is not a Remain party

images.caption: Lib Dems lead the fight to stop Brexit

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet states that only the Liberal Democrats can beat Labour in the reader's area, implying a strategic voting consideration.
